contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox prison | prison_name = Kirkconnell Correctional Centre | location = [[Sunny Corner, New South Wales|Sunny Corner]], near [[Bathurst, New South Wales|Bathurst]], [[New South Wales]] | status = Closed | classification = Minimum (males only) | capacity = 250 | opened = | closed = December 2011 | managed_by = [[Corrective Services NSW]] | coordinates = }} '''Kirkconnell Correctional Centre''', an [[Australia]]n former [[prison|minimum security prison]] for males, is located {{convert|30|km}} east of [[Bathurst, New South Wales|Bathurst]], [[New South Wales]].<ref>{{cite web |title=Kirkconnell Correctional Centre |publisher= New South Wales Government |work=Corrective Services NSW |url=http://www.correctiveservices.nsw.gov.au/offender-management/correctional-centres/kirkconnell |accessdate=1 December 2010 }}</ref> The Centre is located in the [[Sunny Corner, New South Wales|Sunny Corner]] State Forest and has a fully trained bushfire fighting team comprising both prison staff and inmates. In September 2011 it was reported that [[Corrective Services NSW]] will close the facility in December 2011, as a cost saving measure.<ref>{{cite news |author=Shanahan, Leo |date=7 September 2011 |agency=AAP |work=The Australian |url=http://www.theaustralian.com.au/national-affairs/state-politics/closures-to-make-other-nsw-jails-rougher-says-prison-officers-union/story-e6frgczx-1226130919608 |title=Closures to make other NSW jails rougher, says prison officers' union |accessdate=25 February 2012 }}</ref><ref>{{cite news |title=A way to get out of three jails |url=http://www.smh.com.au/nsw/a-way-to-get-out-of-three-jails-20110906-1jvz6.html |author=Patty, Anna |date=7 September 2011 |work=The Sydney Morning Herald |accessdate=25 February 2012 }}</ref> All of inmates were relocated to the minimum security wings at [[Bathurst Correctional Centre]] and [[Long Bay Correctional Centre|Long Bay]].<ref>{{cite press release |title=Prisons to close |date=6 September 2011 |publisher=Corrective Services NSW |format=PDF |accessdate=25 February 2012 |url=http://www.lawlink.nsw.gov.au/lawlink/Corporate/ll_corporate.nsf/vwFiles/060911_CS_prisons.pdf/$file/060911_CS_prisons.pdf }}</ref> ==Notable prisoners== *[[Rodney Adler]]<ref>{{cite news |url=http://www.theage.com.au/news/National/Adler-moved-to-Bathurst-prison/2005/06/18/1119119715117.html |title=Adler moved to Bathurst prison |work=The Age |author= Mitchell, Alex |agency=AAP |date=19 June 2005 |accessdate=3 January 2012 }}</ref>{{spaced ndash}}disgraced businessman *[[Roger Rogerson]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{NewSouthWalesPrisons}} {{coord missing|New South Wales}} [[Category:Bathurst, New South Wales]] [[Category:Defunct prisons in Australia]] [[Category:2011 disestablishments]] {{Australia-prison-stub}}
